price: 199. A continuación abandonad el lugar con la multitud y pedid el perdón de Al-lah. En verdad, Él es Indulgente y Misericordioso.
arabic: ثُمَّ أَفِيضُواْ مِنۡ حَيۡثُ أَفَاضَ ٱلنَّاسُ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: thumma afīḍū min ḥaythu afāḍa al-nāsu wa-is'taghfirū al-laha inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
